summary:
Master in Architecture, with a specialization in Theory and Practice of the Architectural Project, at the Technical University of Catalonia. In Chile, Spain, and The Netherlands I have exercised as an architect and an interior designer for a large list of projects.

My academic and professional background in architecture and interior design has led to a wide range of
experience developing projects for private and commercial clients, as for local authorities.

My projects over the years have included public space regeneration, large and single residential development, interior design, and yachting. Always with a focus on creating places in which people can lead a better life.

I have direction and management experience in architecture ateliers, as teaching experience in pre-degree university studies and development of interdisciplinary university workshops related to architecture.

Currently, I work at Just Design Studio in Amsterdam as an architect and interior designer, leading the entire project development process.
